name: prattling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
prattle
to talk in a silly way or like a child for a long time about things that are not important or without saying anything important: She'd have prattled on about her new job for the whole afternoon if I'd let her. Stop your prattling and go to sleep! Synonyms
blabber informal
chatter
prate old-fashionedCompare
gabble verb mainly UK
gibber mainly disapproving
